messages.title: Protecting Our Communities
messages.content: A record of successful action by Liberal Democrat Councillors protecting the Green Belt from inappropriate development, opposing a second runway expansion at Gatwick, opposing cuts to hospital services and strengthening the local economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting Income Tax by a further Â£400 for ordinary workers.
Balancing the budget while protecting vital local services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More money for the NHS and protecting education spending
keyPolicies.policyDescription: More money for the NHS and protecting education spending.

mentions.candidate: Paul Kennedy has a plan to secure the recovery and build a stronger economy and fairer society.

issues.economy: Paul Kennedy has a plan to secure the recovery and build a stronger economy and fairer society.
issues.environment: A record of successful action by Liberal Democrat Councillors protecting the Green Belt from inappropriate development.

housing.content: A record of successful action by Liberal Democrat Councillors protecting the Green Belt from inappropriate development.

politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully opposed a second runway at Gatwick and cuts to hospital services. Strengthening local businesses and securing funding for a DisabledGo access guide. Commitment to protecting the Green Belt from inappropriate development.

images.caption: Lib Dem Plan for a Stronger Economy and Fairer Society.
